Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.hologram

Class DisplayHologram

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.hologram.DisplayHologram
public class DisplayHologram extends Object
A per-player hologram implementation using the new Text Display entity. This implementation does not use any "fancy" stuff like Hologram.
